Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class Parameter

    Class defines Parameter object and it's members. Parameter hold information used by Action plugins. Each plugin defines it's own list of parameters but each one must instantiate this class

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    ParameterInfo
    Parameter
